intro: Hymenopus sothersiae, commonly known as the Sothersia's lily, is a rare and delicate flowering plant native to the high-altitude regions of South America. It belongs to the Liliaceae family and is characterized by its striking white and pink petals that resemble those of a lily. The plant produces small, fragrant flowers that bloom during the early spring season. It thrives in cool, moist environments and requires well-drained soil to prevent root rot. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered an endangered species.
